FuncDef:
The ccc description command configures a description for a circuit cross connect (CCC) connection.
The undo ccc description command deletes the description of a CCC connection.
By default, no description is configured for a CCC connection.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a CCC connection.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed in double quotation marks.

Specifies the description of a CCC.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.The string cannot start at or end with a blink space.

Examples: [*HUAWEI] ccc ccc1 interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0 out-interface GigabitEthernet 2/0/0
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On CCC virtual private wire service (VPWS) networks, to configure a description for a CCC connection, run the ccc description command. The description is easy to understand and maintain, facilitating VPWS network management.
